snippet: This is the second time Notre Dame's basketball team is vying for the N.C.A.A. women's basketball title, and it knows winning a championship won't be easy. Last year ended in a loss to Texas A&M, and Tuesday night, they face a 39-0 Baylor team...
abstract: This is the second time Notre Dame's basketball team is vying for the N.C.A.A. women's basketball title, and it knows winning a championship won't be easy. Last year ended in a loss to Texas A&M, and Tuesday night, they face a 39-0 Baylor team looking to make history.

headline.main: Notre Dame Says All the Pressure Is on Baylor
